overview: Documentary about twenty years of existence of Kampsa, squatted house in 1992, on the border between Pasaia and San Sebastian, in Basque Country. Music, skateboarding and post-nuclear environments, to remember some stories that would otherwise end up sinking forever, in the mud of Pasaia. Two decades of self-management and shared illusions. Two decades of parties, gigs and activities. Two decades of resistance, and after all, two decades of dreams to be fulfilled, on the basis of desire and selflessness.
title: KAMPSA
